synopsis.text: Kyosukeâ€™s life takes a dramatic turn when he is stabbed by his own mother in a cathedral they sought refuge in after fleeing from a disease-ridden moon colony. Miraculously, he survives and discovers his ability to transform into a powerful alien mutant, the Soultaker, upon severe injury or death. In a post-apocalyptic world, Kyosuke embarks on a dangerous journey to find his long-lost twin sister, Runa, who has been kidnapped by the sinister Kirihara Group. Along the way, he uncovers shocking truths about his mother's suicide and her connection to Runa's fragmented soul. With relentless pursuits from the Hospital and the Kirihara Group, Kyosuke must harness his newfound powers to protect his sister, unravel his mother's mysterious past, and crush the evil forces hunting them.
